FuncDef:
The l2tp lac session-limit command limits the maximum number of sessions established on the L2TP LAC.
The undo l2tp lac session-limit command restores the default configuration.
By default, the maximum number of user sessions allowed on an L2TP LAC is 200K.

ParaDef.Info:
The maximum number of user sessions allowed on an L2TP LAC.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: Running the l2tp lac session-limit command changes the L2TP user specifications on the LAC. Excess users cannot go online.
